alert.note: Alert for Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meagher County through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles north of Clyde Park, or 30 miles southeast of White Sulphur Springs, moving east northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Martinsdale. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 75 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central Montana.
